title: Toledo Cop ARRESTED For Shoplifting
description:
In this video, I discuss the recent arrest of Toledo police officer Gregory Long for repeated instances of petty thefts at local Walmart locations. I explain how silly this crime is as well as how Walmart loss prevention cracked the case
